alert.note: Alert for Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 30 at 8:33AM EDT until July 31 at 6:09AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River at Heidelberg. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 23.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The river crested at 26.1 feet around noon on Friday. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 12.6 feet early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 23.2 feet on 03/08/1967. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued 12 PM EDT.
